author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates hltGetConfiguration and sub table creation to handle the new HLT configs which will use FinalPaths. It also allows sub table creation to use the test converter and dev database.   The generated HLT output paths for offline use are also updated to be FinalPaths.

Finally it adapts hltGetConfiguration to handle the new OutputModule GlobalEvtOutputModule. 

No changes are expected when retrieving existing configs except the generated output paths will be FinalPaths.

#### PR validation:

subtable creation with the new converter works as expected

```
hltGetConfiguration /dev/CMSSW_12_3_0/GRun --offline --full --mc --globaltag auto:phase1_2021_realistic 
```
gives identical results before and after this fix.  With `--output full` , the difference is the output path is now a FinalPath

```
hltGetConfiguration v3-test/dev:/users/sharper/2022/CMSSW_12_3_0_V27_DatasetPathV2/GRun --offline --full --mc --globaltag auto:phase1_2021_realistic 
```

produces a runable config.
title: hltGetConfiguration updates to deal with FinalPaths and new OutputModule
